question:
You work for a company. You have seen some information online about a training courses that would be useful for your work. 
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter


. give details of the courses
. say how the courses would be useful
. explain how the company could help you do this course.
text: I recently have seen one essential course from online, that course is called ADVANCED DIGITAL MARKETING course. this is a five-day plan conducted by Marketing association in our hometown, this is a full-time program, it will start on Monday 15 to Friday 20 this month.

This plan is most essential for our company because our companies sales ratio has declined in the recent months, You also think about how to increase the sales ratio. I ensure this plan will be helpful for our enterprise. After finish this internship program, we could be applied new marketing strategies for attracting the customer. I hope our enterprise might be gotten more profit from this.

I want a five-day paid leave from you, I believe this time our management not being busy and no one applied in my team. That day no one will take leave I did conform from my fellow workers. I would be grateful if you could allow permission to participate in this.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
